tool_description: This API collects pictures of K-pop stars from all over the world and return random pictures according to user's request.
title: Face Match

api_list.name: Random male image
api_list.description: Returns a random male K-pop star image.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://c9dong-face-match-v1.p.rapidapi.com/random/m"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "c9dong-face-match-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
